name: Nyctophobia (itch) (JamieE2004)
description:
Nyctophobia is the more Content-Complete version of my college GameJam entry, Be afraid of the Dark: https://jamiee2004.itch.io/be-afraid-of-the-dark

In Nyctophobia, you're trapped, lost in a mysterious, dark facility and all you have is the flash of your firearm to light your way. But be careful, you are not alone...

Controls:

WASD - Move

E - Interact

Mouse - Aim

Left Click - Shoot

Right Click - Throw Bottle

Shift - Sprint

Space - Trap (Exterminator mode)
